channel.title: Masks: Evolution
channel.description:
X-Men: Evolution was an early-2000s animated series of varying quality in which the teenaged X-Men faced such terrors as high school, dating, and suspecting their principal was a supervillain. You’re not the X-Men. You are—dare I say—cooler.
This five-part series is scheduled for Mondays at 4pm AKDT (24:00 UTC), and sessions will run for three hours.
[date=2019-04-01 time=16:00:00 timezone="America/Anchorage"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LYKn0C2EDX7vWHR9Nd6

[date=2019-04-29 time=16:00:00 timezone="America/Anchorage"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LYKo1B8xACen2nMlyDG
